name: FlipperLayout
description: A layout acting like a drawer. It can be flinged to the right side out of the screen.

name: Flip3DLayout
description: Flip or reverse flip between two children layouts

name: StackLayout
description: Acting like FrameLayout, but has an optional translate animation when adding or removing to it.

name: StackLayout /w Fragment
description: The same as StackLayout, but manages the children with FragmentManager using the android support package.

name: HorizontalTranslateLayout
description: A layout that can be translate to left/right/both direction.

name: RefresherView
description: A container view can use pull-down-to-refresh.
